body.p: The Board decided to require in IAS 16 that all items of property, plant and equipment acquired in exchange for non‑monetary assets or a combination of monetary and non‑monetary assets should be measured at fair value, except that, if the exchange transaction lacks commercial substance or the fair value of neither of the assets exchanged can be determined reliably, then the cost of the asset acquired in the exchange should be measured at the carrying amount of the asset given up.
